snippet: Paula Creamer pulled even with Alison Walshe and Beatriz Recari at eight-under-par 134, and top-ranked Inbee Park was in a pack at six under.
abstract: Paula Creamer, Beatriz Recari and Alison Walshe share second-round lead at LPGA's Marathon Classic golf tournament in Sylvania, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer pulled even with Alison Walshe and Beatriz Recari at eight-under-par 134, and top-ranked Inbee Park was in a pack at six under.

headline.main: Three Tied for Lead in L.P.G.A.’s Marathon Classic
